entities.name: company
entities.description: Business entity creating the marketing plan

entities.name: owner
entities.description: Person with ownership stake in the company

entities.name: stakeholder
entities.description: Person or organization with interest in the company

entities.name: industry
entities.description: Market sector where the company operates

entities.name: product
entities.description: Item or service offered to customers

entities.name: competitive advantage
entities.description: What sets the company apart from competitors

entities.name: SWOT analysis
entities.description: Analysis of strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and threats

components.name: current situation analysis
components.description: Assessment of the company's current position

components.name: business idea definition
components.description: Clear statement of the company's core purpose

components.name: competitive advantage identification
components.description: Determining what makes the company unique

components.name: industry analysis
components.description: Evaluation of market size, growth and competition

components.name: stakeholder analysis
components.description: Assessment of role of owners, employees and partners

components.name: customer segment analysis
components.description: Understanding of customer groups and their characteristics

components.name: bargaining power assessment
components.description: Evaluation of customer and supplier influence

components.name: dependency relationship mapping
components.description: Understanding of interdependencies

components.name: product significance analysis
components.description: Evaluation of sales volume, margin and competitiveness by product

components.name: SWOT analysis
components.description: Framework for analyzing strengths, weaknesses, opportunities and threats

components.name: environmental change assessment
components.description: Evaluation of how market areas are changing

components.name: strategy selection
components.description: Choice between cost efficiency, differentiation or narrow focus

components.name: image objectives setting
components.description: Defining how different aspects should be perceived

components.name: product image planning
components.description: Determining impression products should convey

components.name: pricing image planning
components.description: Defining whether positioned as cheap, quality or value for money

components.name: personnel image planning
components.description: Determining how employees should perceive the company

components.name: environmental responsibility planning
components.description: Making responsibility visible externally

components.name: growth planning
components.description: Deciding which areas to abandon and where to invest

components.name: financial objective setting
components.description: Defining profitability and market position targets

components.name: five-year outlook
components.description: Long-term vision for the company

systems.name: marketing planning system
systems.description: Framework for developing comprehensive marketing strategies

systems.name: strategic planning system
systems.description: Framework for setting long-term business direction

systems.name: performance measurement system
systems.description: Framework for tracking marketing plan success

constraints.description: Plan must analyze business idea and competitive advantage
Must assess industry situation including market size and growth
Must analyze customer segments and their characteristics
Must assess bargaining power of customers and suppliers
Must evaluate product significance by sales volume and margin
Must select strategic approach (cost efficiency, differentiation, or narrow focus)
Must define image objectives for products, pricing, personnel and environment
Must define growth plan for investment and divestment
Must set financial objectives for profitability and market position

metadata.title: Template: Marketing Plan (Comprehensive)
metadata.description: Template for strategic planning of marketing and corporate image
